Prudent means "wise or shrewd," but add the prefix im- meaning "not," suddenly 
you have an adjective that describes the opposite of being wise or shrewd. An 
imprudent person doesn't think about the consequences and might cross the 
street without looking both ways or bring the radio ... heedful of potential 
consequences.
